metadata.title: Response on Teams - HaveIBeenPwned
metadata.description: This playbook checks if user accounts are breached, sends email to breached user account and closes incident based on action taken by SOC.
mainSteps: 1. Fetch the breach information from HaveIBeenPwned
2. Sends adaptive card to SOC with breach information from HaveIBeenPwned
prerequisites: 1. HaveIBeenPwned Custom Connector needs to be deployed prior to the deployment of this playbook under the same resource group.
2. Generate an API key. Refer this link [ how to generate the API Key](https://haveibeenpwned.com/API/Key)
3. Users must have access to Microsoft Teams and they should be a part of a Teams channel.

body.Body:
Hi ,

Your account has been identified in data breach(es).
@{Outputs('Filter_array_all_breaches_in_html_format')?['body']?[0]?['Breaches']}

Here's what you can do

1.Change your password for the above mentioned site(s).
2.Navigate to HIBP website  to verify the breach information.

Note: Do not respond to this email since it is auto generated.
